      Data Description
      Citation:Bickert, Torsten; Wefer, Gerold; Müller, Peter J (2003): Stable 
      isotopes and sedimentology of sediment core GeoB1211-3, 
      doi:10.1594/PANGAEA.103634
      Reference(s):Bickert, Torsten (1992): Rekonstruktion der spätquartären 
      Bodenwasserzirkulation im östlichen Südatlantik über stabile Isotope 
      benthischer Foraminiferen, Berichte, Fachbereich Geowissenschaften, 
      Universität Bremen, 27, 205 pp
      Bickert, Torsten; Wefer, Gerold (1996): Late Quaternary deep water 
      circulation in the South Atlantic: Reconstruction from carbonate 
      dissolution and benthic stable isotopes, In: Wefer, G; Berger, W H; 
      Siedler, G & Webb, D (eds.), The South Atlantic: Present and Past 
      Circulation. Springer-Verlag, Berlin, 103, 599-620
      Project(s):Geosciences, University of Bremen (GeoB)
      South Atlantic in Late Quaternary: Reconstruction of Budget and Currents 
      (SFB261)
      Coverage:West: 7.5333 * East: 7.5333 * South: -24.4750 * North: -24.4750
      Minimum Age: 6.000 ka BP * Maximum Age: 1125.000 ka BP
      Date/Time Start: 1990-03-20T00:00:00 * Date/Time End: 1990-03-20T00:00:00
      Minimum DEPTH, sediment: 0.0 m * Maximum DEPTH, sediment: 8.4 m
      Event(s):GeoB1211-3 * Latitude: -24.4750 * Longitude: 7.5333 * Elevation: 
      -4084.0 m * Date/Time: 1990-03-20T00:00:00 * Recovery: 8.61 m * 
      Penetration: 0.00 m * Location: Cape Basin * Campaign: M12/1 * Basis:
